title: Fork, 1985-103-170, ca. 1650–1700
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Two broad curved tines, long baluster-shaped neck. Plain silver ferrule, oval in section. Handle carved ivory, a man in Charles II period costume, holding a scepter in one hand, pointing at the scepter with the other hand.
